name: Goals
description:
Reach your goal before your life is over.
You move a fixed amount of squares per round, depending on your stage of life.

My entry for Ludum Dare 44.
Theme: Your Life is Currency

Feel free to rate and leave a comment there as well, thanks!
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/goals

Art, Sound and Code by me.
Font used: Aldo the Apache by AJ Paglia
